instruction: Summarize the key points in the story.
input: Once upon a time, there was an old woman who lived in a small cottage in the woods. Every day she would go out to collect mushrooms and berries to make her dinner. One day she stumbled upon a magical lamp and when she rubbed it, a genie appeared.
output: The story centers around an old woman living in a cottage in the woods, who stumbles across a magical lamp. When she rubs the lamp a genie appears who grants the woman three wishes. The story highlights the importance of being careful what one wishes for, as the woman discovers not everything is as it seems.
